features.featureTitle: Update `frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx` to match the structure, layout, Tailwind classes, and user-facing copy from the provided HTML snippet: sticky top navbar with text-only brand ("MAGICAL SERVICE" + "Ahmedabad & Gandhinagar") and a phone CTA; add a hero section (blue background) with heading "Professional Cleaning Service", subheading "Trusted Experts in Ahmedabad & Gandhinagar", and a primary "WhatsApp Inquiry" button linking to `https://wa.me/918000262644`; then render the "Our Service Rates" section with an underlined title and four service-rate cards (Sofa/AC Jet/Mattress/Carpet-Chair) using the same rounded corners, borders, and hover translate/transition behavior as the snippet; then render the 3-item benefits strip with the same mobile border-top behavior; then render the UPI + review section with "Scan to Pay (UPI)", QR image URL exactly as provided, and "UPI ID: jrg7311@okicici"; keep the floating WhatsApp button at bottom-right linking to `https://wa.me/918000262644`.

Replace any FontAwesome `<i class="...">` icon usage implied by the provided HTML with the existing project icon approach (e.g., `lucide-react` and/or `react-icons` already used in `LandingPage.tsx`), while keeping the visual intent (phone icon, WhatsApp icon, sofa/snowflake/bed/rug-like icons, shield/bolt/wallet-like icons).
